    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_828cf9f3ac6f66f6495c2e2d0c48d7f25d0f6ccf</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_828cf9f3ac6f66f6495c2e2d0c48d7f25d0f6ccf</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Time dependence of rate of radiation emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeitabhängigkeit von Kinetik der Strahlung 
Emission</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La dépendance de temps de la cadence de 
l'émission de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dependência do tempo da taxa da emissão da 
radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dipendenza di tempo del tasso dell'emissione di 
radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονική εξάρτηση του ποσοστού εκπομπής ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dependencia del tiempo del índice de la emisión
de la radiación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship of rate of radiation emitted over a period of time of a radionuclide and the time taken for radiation to fall to half its original level.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive decay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiation emission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radionuclide</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis der 
Kinetik der Strahlung ausgestrahlt über eine Zeitdauer von Zeit eines
Radionuklids und der Zeit, die für Strahlung zum Fall zur Hälfte 
seine ursprüngliche Stufe gedauert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre le rapport de la 
cadence du rayonnement émise sur une certaine période de temps d'un 
radionucléide et la durée du rayonnement à la chute à la moitié 
de son niveau initial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento da 
taxa da radiação emissora sobre um período de época de um 
radionuclide e do momento feito exame para a radiação à queda à 
metade do seu nível original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto del 
tasso di radiazione emesso per un periodo di tempo di un radionuclide 
e la durata di radiazione alla caduta alla metà del relativo livello 
originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
του ποσοστού ακτινοβολίας που εκπέμπεται για μια χρονική περίοδο 
του χρόνου ενός ραδιονουκλεϊδίου και που λαμβάνεται για την 
ακτινοβολία για να μειωθεί σε μισό της αρχικό επίπεδο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo del índice 
de la radiación emitido durante época de un radionuclide y la época
llevada para la radiación la caída a la mitad de su nivel original.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">radioaktiver Zerfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stunden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung Emission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radionuklid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affaiblissement radioactif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">heures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">émission de rayonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">radionucléide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deterioração radioativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">horas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">emissão da radiação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radionuclide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">deperimento radioattivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">emissione di radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radionuclide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">emisión de la radiación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
